cuisine_count.impact: STRONG - zones with more cuisines have significantly higher repeat rates
cuisine_count.recommendation: Keep cuisine threshold - it predicts success

rating.impact: MODERATE - rating matters but 4.5 threshold is too strict
rating.finding: 4.5 threshold shows NO significant difference in repeat rate (p=0.21)

repeat_rate.finding: 35% repeat rate is aspirational - only 1 zone achieves it
repeat_rate.recommendation: Lower repeat threshold to 20% (achievable by top 41% of zones)

recommended_thresholds.justification: These thresholds are achievable (21% of zones pass) while still being meaningful (all show significant correlation with success)
